title: Alexandre Cuvillier
text:
Alexandre Cuvillier (born 17 June 1986 in <a href="Cucq">Cucq</a>) is a French <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who plays for <a href="AS%20Blainville">AS Blainville</a> in the <a href="Premi%C3%A8re%20Ligue%20de%20soccer%20du%20Qu%C3%A9bec">Première Ligue de soccer du Québec</a>.
Career.
Cuvillier began his career at <a href="Stade%20de%20Reims">Stade de Reims</a>. In 2008, he joined <a href="Ligue%202">Ligue 2</a> side <a href="US%20Boulogne">US Boulogne</a>.
After retiring from football, he moved to Canada to pursue other projects. In 2021, he returned to the sport, joining <a href="AS%20Blainville">AS Blainville</a>, where he will play for the first team in the third-tier <a href="Premi%C3%A8re%20Ligue%20de%20soccer%20du%20Qu%C3%A9bec">Première Ligue de soccer du Québec</a>, as well as coach their U17 team.
